test.name: TC01 - ไม่กรอกข้อมูลแล้วกดปุ่ม Login (test to fail)

kw.name: Open Web Site Pantipmarket On Browser
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.arg: ข่าวสารและกิจกรรม
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Mouse Down On Link
kw.doc: Simulates a mouse down event on a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Alert Should Be Present
kw.arg: กรุณากรอก "Username" ด้วยค่ะ
kw.doc: Verifies that an alert is present and by default, accepts it.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.name: TC02 - กรอกชื่อผู้ใช้และรหัสผ่านที่เป็นภาษาไทยแล้วกดปุ่ม Login (test to fail)

kw.name: Open Web Site Pantipmarket On Browser
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.arg: ข่าวสารและกิจกรรม
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Mouse Down On Link
kw.doc: Simulates a mouse down event on a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.arg: สมชาติหล่อดี
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'สมชาติหล่อดี' into text field 'username'.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.arg: จอร์นชาวไร่
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Temporally setting log level to: NONE
Log level changed from NONE to INFO.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Alert Should Be Present
kw.arg: กรุณากรอก "Username" ด้วยค่ะ
kw.doc: Verifies that an alert is present and by default, accepts it.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
